data.text: @TinaNarvaezJr Looks like @GamersNexus Steve's hair to me. ^_^

@TinaNarvaezJr The sooner we legalize consciousness expanding plants the sooner we have the utopia everyone knows is possible. Addiction has all the psychiatric medications we need to be responsible with all the cathartic releasing experience that is psychedelics. Psychology needs to evolve.
@TinaNarvaezJr also want to note, i’m not wearing my glasses so i just saw the “i cut off six inches” part, so my apologies 😅

@TinaNarvaezJr if you would ever be interested in it, an undercut saved me from this! i used to take an hour and a half just straightening my hair to like 20-30 minutes. i still have super thick hair, but it’s saved me so much grief and it looks real cool
@TinaNarvaezJr I feel this. Every hairstylist I've seen says the same! Your hair is GORGEOUS!

@TinaNarvaezJr My wife is puerto rican and Dominican and  she gets the same reaction. She actually once had a hairdresser quit working on her hair mid job, pretend she didn’t understand her even though she was speaking perfect english 5 minutes prior.
@TinaNarvaezJr Throwback to when my hair was super long like yours! https://t.co/lzZH0t1bZN
@TinaNarvaezJr SAME. Then it's followed up by them making a comment about how they don't know what to do with it. Super comforting coming from someone about to change how I look. 😆
@TinaNarvaezJr I used to get the same comment, and then PCOS found me 😭😅
@TinaNarvaezJr I'm a boy and keep mine fairly short, but get the same comment.
